name: PATHFINDER (lmncf)
description:
You are the main operator of the working robot, codenamed "PATHFINDER".

You must use the remote control to give commands to the robot, gradually restoring the hill, building beams to connect the destroyed sections.

The PATHFINDER relies on you! Despite the fact that this is just an unfeeling
piece of steel and copper, devoid of a heart, it would be sad to lose it, so proceed carefully! Good luck.
